description:
Al Quran - القران الكريم app is an authentic Islamic application that complements the traditional printed Qur'an, providing a variety of features for Listening & Reading Holy Quran for iPhone and iPad users.
تطبيق Al Quran - القران الكريم هو تطبيق إسلامي أصيل يكمّل القرآن المطبوع التقليدي، حيث يوفر مجموعة من الميزات للاستماع وقراءة القران الكريم لمستخدمي آيفون وآيباد.

The Qur'an, revered as the Holy Book of Islam, stands as the ultimate source of guidance and wisdom for all of humanity. In the divine revelation, the Angel Jibril (AS) conveyed Allah's profound words to the revered Prophet Muhammad (صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم) over the course of 23 years, shaping the sacred scripture into its transcendent form.

القرآن، الذي يعتبر كتاب الله المقدس في الإسلام، يقف كمصدر نهائي للهداية والحكمة لكل البشر. في الوحي الإلهي، قام الملك جبريل (عليه السلام) بنقل كلمات الله العميقة إلى النبي المحترم محمد (صلى الله عليه وآله وسلم) على مدى ٢٣ عامًا، صاغًا بذلك كتاب المقدس في شكله السامي.

Al Quran - القران الكريم is a beautiful and inspiring Holy Book, and it is said that the recitation of the Qur'an is one of the most rewarding acts of worship. 
The Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) said, The best among you are those who learn the Qur'an and teach it." (Sahih Bukhari, Hadith number 5029)
 
القران - القران الكريم هو كتاب مقدس جميل وملهم، ويقال أن تلاوة القران من أكثر العبادات مكافأة. 
قال النبي محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم: «خيركم من تعلم القران وعلمه» - (صحيح البخاري، الحديث رقم ٥٠٢٩)
Features:

Experience seamless reading with our app's resume feature for Quran قران readers and reciters. Enjoy crystal-clear HD quality with a 16 line display mirroring the precision of a paper Quran. Unlike traditional paper versions, our app's Arabic Word Zoom feature allows users to read with enhanced accuracy and the ability to zoom in. Our efficient search function, combined with the Go To Page feature, enables users to navigate directly to any Qur'an page, enhancing the overall user experience.

Our Quran Majeed  القران المجيد app also provides the Hijri date, with an available option for hijri date adjustment. You can manually adjust the Hijri date according to your preferences.

Discover our Global Prayer Times Clock, equipped with Azan / Adhan alarms featuring short and long adhan sounds. With support for diverse prayer time calculation methods, the app automatically detects your current location and calculates prayer timings for you. Customize manually as needed.

To cater to the diverse needs of Muslim residing in various countries, our Al Quran - القران الكريم is fully available in local languages such as English, Arabic, Hindi, Indonesian, Urdu, Persian, Turkish, Malay, Malayalam, French, Russian, Uzbek, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, German, Thai, and Bengali. This broad language support is designed to enhance the experience for Muslims across the globe.

Indulge in the melodic recitations of 20+ renowned Quran reciters on Al Quran - القران الكريم app. Seamlessly stream or save audio for offline listening, featuring distinguished voices from World famous reciters

[Enjoy Novelmates]
Novelmates is your gateway to a romantic world of addictive novels from various genres. Dive into captivating stories, explore new plots on those web novels. With Novelmates, immerse yourself into storytelling anytime, anywhere.

[Features]
1.Extensive Library: Access a diverse library of novels spanning multiple genres, including romance, mystery, fantasy, science fiction, thriller, and more.

2.Personalized Recommendations: Discover new novels tailored to your preferences based on your favorite novels and stories.

3.Bookmarking: Bookmark your favorite novels and never lose your place in a story.

4.Night Mode: Read comfortably in low-light conditions with the night mode feature, reducing eye strain.

5.Seamless Experience: Enjoy a seamless reading experience with smooth page-turning animations and intuitive navigation controls.

6.Subscriptions: Enjoy the unlimited reading experience without interruptions after subscribing, allowing you to fully immerse yourself in the story.

Enhance your recitation and spiritual experience with the real feel of actual printed Quran anytime anywhere. Holy Quran has a real page turning effect, elegant style, smooth Nastaliq font and different modes for better readability. 

Now it comes with bundle of new customization options for giving your eyes extreme comfort while reading. 

Easy Navigation:
----------------
Open any Juz or Surah directly from index. It has all 30 chapters and 114 surahs, long tap to view information about it. Resume option will take you to the page where you left reading last time. With go-to page number option you can jump to a page instantly. 

Quick Toolbar:
--------------
A new toolbar has been added to Holy Quran pages to quickly access useful functions such as save bookmark, night-mode, page sound, page overlay and settings.

Bookmarks:
------------
Save your favorite surah or page with unlimited bookmarks. While reading just tap the bookmark icon in quick toolbar to save the current page. If quick toolbar is turned off then you can save the current page by pressing volume-up button. New bookmarks can also be added from bookmarks menu by pressing Plus button.

Brightness controller:
---------------------
Now you can set and adjust custom brightness of pages in app-settings. This app-setting will not affect your phone’s system brightness settings.

Font Colors:
------------
You can change font color of pages, whichever you like from given five font colors. It is also really helpful for people with color-blindness problem.

Page Presets:
-------------
Page preset gives you a totally changed look of Quran pages with beautiful combination of colored background and text. You can choose any preset among given five presets from settings.

Night Mode:
------------
It will turn the background black and text into white color which will give you more comfortable reading screen at night or in low light conditions.

Overlay Mode:
--------------
If your eyes are not comfortable with any color or brightness of pages then page-overlay is for you. It will make a colored overlay as a shield layer in front of pages to protect your eyes from sharpness of colors and brightness. You can set the color shade and intensity of overlay from settings.

Highlighted Verses:
-------------------
Sajdah ayaat are highlighted with green color. Starting of each Juz is prominent by first line with black background. 

Other Features:
---------------
* Screen will not turn-off while you are reading
* On-page notifications when a setting is changed
* Double tap back button to exit the application
* Page reflection will show mirror image of page being turned on its back, it can be turned on from settings
* The main menu supports multiple languages, it will be automatically appear in your phone’s language
* Explore more options in the side menu

Compact Size:
---------------
This is only a single file download, just install and enjoy the app. Most of the applications require 100MB to 500MB external data download after installation, but this app doesn’t need any external data. 

Easy Sharing:
-------------
Be a part in spreading the Holy Book of Allah and help others to gather its blessings. Share it with friends and family via Sms, Email, Bluetooth, Facebook, Whatsapp and other sharing options. 

Feedback:
----------
We warmly welcome your suggestions, recommendations and improvement ideas. Send your feedback at feedback@fanzetech.com
---
Please remember us in your prayers.

NOTE: We appreciate your feedback! Do write to us if u have suggestions/corrections!

This app consists of authentic du'as/ssupplications, remembrance/azkaar from the Quran and sunnah.

Most of this app is adapted from the popular book of authentic supplications, "Hisnul-Muslim" compiled by the Shaykh, Sa'eed Ibn Wahf Al-Qahtaanee. The rest of the supplications consist of Duas from the Qur'an and some other authentic duas from the sunnah, compiled from various mentioned sources.

Features
--------------
- Translation languages: ENGLISH, FRENCH, URDU, ROMAN URDU
- Transliterations to help those who are still learning arabic (Note: it is NOT recommended to rely on this and abandon learning arabic).
- Audio for each dua
- References for each dua
- Search for any dua
- Mark your favorites for easy access
- Umrah section - umrah duas compiled in a simple step-by-step guide form.
- 99 Names of Allaah
- Extra reading

This special edition has a specific standard format of sixteen lines per page. 16 Line Holy Quran is specially designed for Hafiz-e-Quran, Muslims who completely memorize Quran in madrasa, school or other religious institution.

From the makers of Quran.com comes Quran for iOS, a beautiful, and ad-free mushaf app. 

It’s now easier to read the Quran on the go, memorize it and listen to your favorite reciters.

This is just the beginning for Quran for iOS. We’ll be updating the app regularly insha'Allah and would love to hear your feedback and feature requests. You can reach us at ios@quran.com

As the Hadeeth (prophetic statement) in At-Tirmithi states: “Whoever reads a letter from the Book of Allah, he will have a reward, and this reward will be multiplied by ten. I am not saying that 'Alif, Laam, Meem' (a combination of letters frequently mentioned in the Holy Quran) is a letter, rather I am saying that ‘Alif’ is a letter, ‘Laam’ is a letter and ‘Meem’ is a letter.” [At-Tirmithi] We hope this app will help you increase your recitation of the Quran and increase your blessings in this world and the hereafter. 


من صناع Quran.com يأتي تطبيق القرآن للأجهزة المحمولة، تطبيق للمصحف ذو صفحات جميلة خالي تماما من الاعلانات.

لقد أصبح من السهل قراءة القرآن بالشارع، وحفظه، والاستماع إلى قارئك المفضل.

هذا هو مجرد بداية لتطبيق القرآن. سنعمل على تحديث التطبيق بشكل منتظم إن شاء الله، ونحب أن نسمع رأيك ومتطلبتك. يمكنك الوصول إلينا عن طريق البريد الإلكتروني ios@quran.com

عَنْ ابْنِ مَسْعُودٍ قَالَ : قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ صَلَّى اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ { مَنْ قَرَأَ حَرْفًا مِنْ كِتَابِ اللَّهِ فَلَهُ حَسَنَةٌ وَالْحَسَنَةُ بِعَشْرِ أَمْثَالِهَا, لَا أَقُولُ الم حَرْفٌ, وَلَكِنْ أَلِفٌ حَرْفٌ, وَلَامٌ حَرْفٌ,وَمِيمٌ حَرْفٌ }. رَوَاهُ التِّرْمِذِيُّ. ونحن نأمل أن يساعدك هذا التطبيق على زيادة قراءتك للقرآن وزيادة حسناتك في الدنيا والآخرة.

This Pro Urdu to English and English to Urdu translation app is very easy and convenient to use for students, adults and for people who work in offices where they required to use English language on daily basis. 

English to Urdu translator - English to Urdu translator can translate has large database and can translate any word from Urdu to English and from English to Urdu. English to Urdu Translator Pro App can give user accurate english to urdu translation and urdu to English translation as well. 

Text to speech feature - English into urdu translator has a unique speaking feature in it. user can use it by tapping text to speech feature on app and speak english words or sentences which user want to translate into urdu. This app instantly gives user the desired result and will give user accurate urdu translation. English to urdu translator voice is less time consuming feature of this app.

Translates sentences - English to Urdu Translator Pro App not only translate urdu word into english or english into urdu It also translates sentences . If user want to find translation of urdu or english sentences this app serves as best for the urdu into english translator or english into urdu translator for sentences. 

Favorite words feature - English to urdu translation offline free download app has a feature of favourite words by marking them saved so by this way you can re-track those saved words offline from wherever or whenever user want to see saved words translation in app translator. user can use this Pro english into urdu app as your dictionary english to urdu translator.

Maintain History Records - Another great feature in this english into urdu translator has that it records all searched words or sentences in history and serves as a english to urdu translator offline and english to urdu and urdu to english dictionary offline. When user re-track or go to histroy directly user will find meanings so this can also give user having advantage of english to urdu translator offline.

Language Learning - English to urdu translator download for mobile is also good for language learning. This english to urdu language translator software sends user regular notification of translation of words and their meaning just to improve your language learning skills. It is the easiest way to improve you language learning skills because no one has time to sit and watch long videos. 

English to urdu translator app Keyboard - English to urdu translator app can also work as english to urdu or urdu to english keyboard. for example if user want to write urdu word or sentences user do not need to change keyboard he just have to copy that words from translator app and paste into wherever he wants. However user can use it if desired.

Free offline dictionary - English to urdu translator free for iOS users and have large database which means user can find translation of every word and sentences. user can also use it as free offline dictionary due to its large database. 

User can share the information finds from translator app with family and friends to improve vocabulary.

 Free download urdu translation app and enjoy great user experience. Please let us know if you want any improvement in this translator app. Your feedback is valuable for us. Thank you

No one to recite to? No problem. Tarteel AI is here!

How many times have you wished you knew more surahs to use in salah? That you could get feedback on your recitation whenever you needed it? That you could memorize more, and worry less?

Hide. Tap. Recite. In three easy moves, you’re strengthening your memorization of the Quran with the world’s leading AI Quran memorization companion. Simply hide the verses, tap the mic and start reciting. The pages will fill with your recitation and if you make a mistake, Tarteel’s intuitive AI will be sure let you know INSTANTLY with its flagship feature, Memorization Mistake Detection. That’s live feedback on your recitation, any time, anywhere - even if you whisper! 

Whether you’re memorizing for your next Hifz class or revising Juz Amma on your daily commute, Tarteel adapts to your recitation, tracks your progress and aligns with your goals. It’s your companion —helping you memorize better, build confidence, and create a Quran habit that lasts a lifetime. No matter where you are in your memorization, Tarteel is here for the journey. 

Tarteel is free to use with no ads and prioritizes user privacy. The team operates within the framework of Ihsan, striving for excellence and using innovative tech to serve the Muslim Ummah.

TARTEEL PREMIUM

Supercharge your Quran memorization with a paid subscription to Tarteel Premium. Try it now for FREE, no credit card required. Features include:

- Memorization Mistake Detection

Start reciting and you’ll be notified whenever you miss a word, use the wrong word or say one word too many! Tarteel will highlight your mistakes and keep track so you can revise and review for next time. Currently, this feature does not include Tajweed or pronunciation correction, but we know there’s community demand and it’s on our roadmap for the future!

- Hidden Verses

Hide the verses and recite; Tarteel will highlight verses and follow along with your recitation so you can check your memorization as you go. You’re one step closer to perfecting that verse!

- Goals

Set custom Goals for what you want to memorize and revise. Choose your portion, deadline and the type of engagement you want; memorization, reading, revision or recitation!

- Historical Mistakes

Progress is key! Tarteel keeps a record of all of your mistakes so you know exactly where your memorization is strong and what could use a little more work. 

- Unlimited Listening and Audio

Solidify your memorization with listening and audio! Choose your favourite Qari, the portion and how many times you want to listen. 

- Advanced Progress Tracking

Check if you’re reaching your goals with detailed analytics around your Quran engagement. 

—

Join the 9M+ Muslims worldwide who are using Tarteel to support their memorization of the Quran!

Do you use Tarteel? Your feedback helps us improve the platform and add to our long-term roadmap. If you’ve benefited from Tarteel, please remember to leave us a review - we’d love to hear from you! Request new features here: [http://feedback.tarteel.ai](http://feedback.tarteel.ai/)

—

NOTES:
Tarteel requires microphone access and a stable internet connection in order for its voice features to function properly. Please ensure you allow Tarteel to access these permissions on your device.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tarteel.ai/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.tarteel.ai/terms/

Wattpad. Where stories live.
Discover the world's most-loved social storytelling platform. Wattpad connects a global community of millions of readers and writers through the power of story. Download it today to start reading or writing original stories.

Get your story discovered
Have your own story to tell? Get it discovered through the power of community and technology on Wattpad. Share an original story on Wattpad and share it with our community who are there to cheer you on throughout your writing journey. Think your story could be the next blockbuster? Wattpad Studios discovers untapped, unsigned, and talented writers on Wattpad and connects them to global multi-media entertainment companies.

Read original stories
Discover stories in over 25 languages from writers around the world! Whatever you’re into reading—romance, science fiction, mystery, comedy, action adventure, fantasy, young adult fiction, or fanfiction—it’s all on Wattpad. So whether you’re looking for more LGBT meet-cutes, cyberpunk fairy tales, or new technothrillers to devour, you’ll find it all, and so much more, on Wattpad.

Connect with a community of story-lovers
When you join Wattpad, you become a member of an international community of story-lovers. Connect with other passionate readers & writers, comment directly in stories as you read them, and support writers as they create and share their original stories. You can even read together and share your library or create reading lists so your friends always know what you’re reading.

Start your own free library
Save your favorite stories to keep them with you wherever you go. Hooked on a story? Simply sync your account to easily pick up where you left off, whether you’re on your laptop, tablet, Kindle or iPhone.

Read the stories that inspired blockbusters
If you’ve streamed Light as a Feather on Hulu or read New York Times best-seller Anna Todd’s series After, you may not know—these stories were first discovered on Wattpad. Join the platform the entertainment industry scours to find its next big hit, and start reading tomorrow’s box-office sensation today.

Wattpad Premium:
- Subscribe to Wattpad Premium for uninterrupted ads-free reading and first access to new features
– Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
– Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of the chosen package
– Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- For full terms of service, visit https://www.wattpad.com/terms
- For our privacy policy, visit https://www.wattpad.com/privacy
– Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Already a Wattpad fan? Follow us on Instagram, TikTok, Facebook and Twitter to stay up-to-date on your favorite writers, stories, contests, and more!

English to Urdu Dictionary Offline with Roman Urdu Lughat



English to Urdu Dictionary offers you to learn English or Urdu for free. If you’re trying to learn English or Urdu and having difficulty knowing the actual meaning in English, Urdu, or with Roman Urdu Translation? Then the most ideal choice for you is the Offline Urdu Dictionary “Urdu Lughat” App. This English Urdu dictionary also includes the feature of providing definitions, synonyms, antonyms, and related words to the users. Users can also get help from our dictionary app by typing Urdu SMS.
 
Offline Urdu Dictionary App allows you to learn English. Offline Dictionary provides you with the meanings of words in English, Urdu & Roman Urdu. It's a 100% Free Application and can be used to learn English to Urdu translation and pronunciation or Vice Versa. Offline Urdu Dictionary App provides meanings from English to Urdu, Roman to English, or Urdu to English. But the most important & significant feature of this dictionary is that it provides users with the meanings of  English words in Urdu. Users who prefer to look up the meanings of English words in Urdu can do so in this dictionary, which functions similarly to an English dictionary.



The functionalities of English Dictionary Offline and Urdu Dictionary Offline are included in this completely free dictionary app. It also includes a built-in Urdu Keyboard and does not require any additional features on your device. You can also refer to it as the Urdu Dictionary with Roman Urdu Translation Capabilities.



Eng to Urdu dictionary App Can be used without any internet connection. The English dictionary app provides users with an autosuggestion feature so that they don’t need to type full words. Users can also use the Speech to text feature which allows them to insert their words just by speaking to the App. Users are allowed to add and remove words from favorites/bookmarks. When the user begins typing, He/She will notice that some words appear on-screen beginning with the letters that the user typed. The Offline Urdu Dictionary App looks for matching words in its database & provides autosuggestions. 



The English Urdu Offline dictionary is developed for people who are familiar with Urdu but wish to learn English. The Offline Dictionary has an enormous database of words with more than 300,000+ words and vocabulary that is updated from time to time on a weekly basis. If you are reading English novels, watching movies with subtitles, or seeing any term and want to know what it means, you can simply search that word in our English to Urdu dictionary. Eng to Urdu offline dictionary.



How to Use:
1- You can search for any English word and then click on it to read the meanings in Urdu and Roman Urdu.
2- You can also search for any Urdu word and then click on it to discover its English meaning.
3- The app also includes an English to Roman Urdu Dictionary, which allows you to search any English or Roman Urdu term and find its meaning in Roman Urdu, English, and Urdu.



Key Features of English to Urdu Dictionary:
- Translations – English to Urdu, Urdu to English with Roman.
- Layout - is very simple and user-friendly.
- Favorites / Bookmarks - you are able to add words to your favorites list by clicking the star/heart icon.
- Thesaurus – sorted list of all words starting with alphabets in English, Roman, and Urdu.
- Test – the app has a unique feature of the MCQ (Multiple Choice Question) test to learn more words
- Notification – the app will notify you with a word daily to increase your vocabulary (Word of the Day)
- Keyboard – both English and Urdu Keyboards are available
- Multiple Options – words with their multiple meanings, definitions, synonyms, antonyms, and related words
- Word spelling, using Text-To-Speech module (No Internet Connection required).
- Maximum data is used - up-to-date vocabulary.
- 300,000+ words and vocabulary is updated from time to time on a weekly basis.

Embark on your spiritual journey with the Ultimate Umrah Guide, an app meticulously crafted to enhance your Umrah experience. Tailored for individuals seeking comprehensive guidance, this app seamlessly combines a concise Umrah guide with authentic dua examples to accompany you at every step.

Duas for Every Step: Explore a rich collection of meticulously curated dua examples to recite at each stage of your Umrah journey. Enhance your connection with the divine through meaningful prayers.

Voice Transcription: Immerse yourself in the spirituality of Umrah with voice/audio transcriptions of all the provided duas. Listen and follow along as you perform each ritual, fostering a deeper connection with your faith.

English Translation: Understand the profound meanings behind the duas with accurate English translations. Gain insights into the spiritual significance of each prayer, fostering a deeper understanding of the rituals.

Multilingual Support: Connect with the divine in your preferred language. Our app is available in multiple languages, ensuring that every user can experience the spiritual journey of Umrah in a language that resonates with them.

Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy an uninterrupted and immersive spiritual experience with our ad-free platform. Your focus should be on the sacred rituals of Umrah, and we ensure a distraction-free environment for your spiritual growth.

Free to Download: Access the complete Umrah guide, dua collection, and all the app features without any cost. We believe in making this spiritual resource freely available to all, fostering inclusivity and accessibility.

Download Now and Begin Your Sacred Journey!

The Ultimate Umrah Guide is designed to be your steadfast companion on this sacred pilgrimage. Download now to access a wealth of knowledge, dua examples, and spiritual guidance. Experience the beauty of Umrah with a user-friendly app that is not only ad-free but also available in multiple languages. May your journey be blessed and spiritually enriching.

Want to strengthen your connection with the Quran? Try our Al Quran app, used by over 13 million people worldwide.

Understand the Quran in your language with Tafsir. Listen to recitations and explore word-by-word meanings and grammar. Search, bookmark, take notes, and track your progress for deeper study.

Listen to beautiful recitations by your favourite Qaris, follow along with tajweed, and read from familiar Mushaf pages, all in one app. This app is completely free with no ads!

Let’s explore how this easy-to-use Quran app will help you connect with the Quran more meaningfully.

Translations, Tafsirs and Surah Info
- Understand the Quran by studying 170+ Translations & Tafsirs of the Quran in 60+ languages: English, Indonesian, Bangla, Hindi, Urdu, German, Chinese, French, Italian, Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tamil, and many more!
- 8 Arabic Tafsirs (including Tafseer Ibn Kathir, Tafseer Tabari, etc.) along with Arabic E3rab, Word Meaning, Asbabun Nuzul
- Surah info: Surah summary and virtues

Word by Word Analysis & Translations
- Read Word by Word translations of the Quran in English, Indonesian, Bangla, German, Hindi, Ingush, Malay, Russian, Tamil, Turkish and Urdu
- Study and analyse Word Root/Lemma, Grammar, Morphology, Occurrences in different forms and Verb Forms to dive in more depth. Helpful to learn & understand Quranic Arabic

Mushaf Mode
- Recite Quran in Mushaf mode to have the same experience when reciting from a hard-copy Mushaf
- Available Mushaf scripts: Madani, Naskh Indopak, Qaloon, Shemerly, Warsh

Library: Bookmarks & Notes
- Bookmark ayahs to your own Collections and keep track of the last read ayah using Pins
- Start reading from where you left off using auto Last Reads
- Reflect and take notes for each ayah (آية)
- Sync library across multiple devices and even share with others using import/export

Search & Quran Subject-wise Topics
- Powerful Search with highlights to quickly find what you are looking for
- Explore by Topics & read the ayahs related to a topic together

Quran Audio
- Listen to Quran recitations by 80+ reciters with Quran audio translation in 10+ languages (downloadable for offline use)
- Reciter Options: Mishary Al Afasy, Husary, Ayman Suwaid, Abdur Rahman As-Sudais and many others
- Powerful Audio System with repeat, group playback of verses function to aid in Quran Memorisation/Quran Hifz
- Reciters tagged based on recitation types: Murattal, Mujawwad, Translation
- Arabic Audio Commentary and Quran audio translation in Bangla, English, Urdu others

Quran Planner, Streak and Badges
- Plan your Khatmah of the Quran using the Quran Planner
- Set your daily reading target, track and increase it gradually
- Monitor your weekly activity
- Build a daily Quran reading habit using Streak
- Earn badges for completing Streak Milestones and exploring app features

Various Customisation Options, Tajweed & Others
- Read in Uthmanic or Indopak script
- Read Tafsirs in Tafsir view
- Recite Tajweed colour-coded Quran with ease
- Quran Dictionary: See the list of roots for different Arabic alphabets
- Various fonts and multiple themes, including Night mode
- Autoscroll feature
- Copy & Share the verses
- All feature supports offline (Quran offline)

15+ Languages
- Arabic, English, Bangla, German, French, Bahasa Indonesia / Malay, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Turkish, Urdu, and more

Download the ad-free Quran app and start your journey to a deeper understanding of the Quran!

Share and recommend this beautiful app to your friends and family. May Allah bless us in this world and the hereafter.

Urdu Quran is an iOS application, which is intended for Urdu speaking people offering an easy to use interface with Urdu Translation, Transliteration and audio (MP3) recitation of all surahs of full Quran kareem. Al Quran in Urdu translation is embedded with several features that are beautifully designed to listen to Quran audio.

Features: 
Some of the main features of this mobile application are:

• Urdu Translation: Helps in better understanding the concepts and revelations of Quran karim by interpreting the meaning of Arabic language in Urdu

• Audio Recitation: Listen to Quran recitation (Qiraat al Quran) of all Chapters in Quran MP3

• Transliteration: Makes pronunciation of Arabic text easy with its similar reading option in English

• Language: Besides the Quran Urdu translation in other languages (English Spanish, French, Chinese, Persian, Italian, Dutch, and Indonesian) is also included

• Search Bar: Facilitates in choosing the desired Surah of the Holy Book

• Go To: Allows app consumer to jump to any Ayah of the present Surah

• Bookmarks: Allows the user to favorite or save a particular part of the recital process in order to continue from the same place where left in Holy Quran.

• Stop Signs: Various kinds of pauses that repeatedly come in the Sacred Volume of Allah are included which lets one know about their interpretation and action

• Sajdahs: 14 places in the where one has to perform prostration in front of the Almighty are also separately mentioned in Settings.

• Font Size: Allows the user to customize font size as per chosen preferences

• Font Style: 3 unique Print Modes are also added into main Settings for variation in outlook of Quranic text.

Download this free of cost Quran translation application now to benefit from its easy to understand presentation and other attributes especially Urdu Translation option to eventually identify with the Quran Kareem effectively.

Your Complete Spiritual Companion 
Holy Quran  is designed for Muslims seeking a seamless, all-in-one app for their spiritual needs. Whether you’re looking for prayer time muslim reminders, salah guide for beginners, or Dhikr tracking, this app brings everything together in a simple and easy-to-use interface. Stay connected with your faith anytime, anywhere. 

Key Features 
Automatic prayer time alarm for all five daily prayers. 
Accurate qibla direction finder for wherever you are. 
Full holy book Quran text for easy reading and recitation. 
High-quality Quran mp3 full offline access to 114 surahs. 
Digital tasbih counter to track your Dhikr effortlessly. 
Morning and evening azkar reminders to keep you spiritually connected. 
Learn and reflect on the 99 names of Allah with meanings and benefits. 

Never Miss a Prayer 
With Holy Quran, you’ll always stay on time for your prayers. The app automatically sends alerts for salah time like Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha, ensuring you never miss an important moment of worship. And with the accurate qibla direction feature, you’ll always know the correct direction to pray, no matter where you are. 

Read and Listen to the Quran 
The app offers both a full al Quran text for easy reading and a complete audio version of all 114 surahs. Whether you prefer to read or listen, you can engage with the holy book Quran in a way that suits your lifestyle. The Quran audio mp3 feature ensures you can access it even when offline. 

Find the Qibla Instantly 
No need to worry about finding the Qibla while traveling or in unfamiliar places. The app’s highly accurate qibla compass direction helps you locate the exact direction for prayer with just one tap, whether you're using it offline or online. 

Simplified Dhikr & Spiritual Growth 
Use the built-in tasbeeh counter to keep track of your Dhikr easily and accurately. Whether you’re at home, traveling, or on the go, this feature helps you stay connected to your faith through daily remembrance. Additionally, explore the 99 names of Allah with meaning to gain deeper insight into their significance and benefits, further enriching your spiritual journey. 

What Sets Us Apart? 
Holy Quran - Deeper Journey offers more than just the basics. We combine offline Quran audio, easy-to-use prayer alarms, and a highly accurate qibla finder in one simple app. It’s designed to be your comprehensive Islamic companion, offering everything you need for your spiritual growth without the hassle of switching between multiple apps. 
Download Holy Quran today and take the next step in your spiritual journey with confidence. All your spiritual tools—prayer time table, Quran reading, and Dhikr tracking—are now in one place, easy, accessible, and reliable. 

Your review is our appreciation. We will try our best to respond to all your contributions and improve the app base on your contributions. Download the Al Quran Sharif Prayer Time and rate 5 our app will be your Islamic companion.

****Biggest & Updated Offline Dictionary****

For all the students and professionals who want to learn English, the app offers both English to Urdu as well as Urdu to English dictionary search. In this app there is a huge database of English as well as urdu words, so no matter you are searching from English to Urdu or from Urdu to English you can find the meanings of your respective words in this app with ease. 

The distinctive features of the offline dictionary app that make it the best solution for finding meanings of urdu words in English are as follows:

▩ Urdu to English – The first feature of the app is it allows you to find meanings of Urdu words in English. This is especially beneficial for Pakistanis & Indians who want to find Urdu to English meanings of difficult words in this dictionary.

▩ English to Urdu – In addition to giving meanings from Urdu to English, the app also gives the default and common functionality of English to Urdu words meanings. Therefore, those who want to find the meanings in conventional way can find urdu meanings of English words in this dictionary.

▩ Speak English Words - You can just listen the English words to learn how to speak the words accurately.

Download the app now and find words meanings from a comprehensive dictionary database.

Quran 16 Line is an intuitive Quran app that enables you to read in the classic 16 Line script with interactive audio and translation features. The 16 Line Quran is used by millions of sub-continent muslims across India, Pakistan, South Africa, UK, USA and around the world. Simply tap and hold on any ayah to play the recitation, memorize, bookmark or view the translation.

Some of the key features include:

THE SCRIPT

- HD Holy Quran 16 Line Script - refined digital design!
- Classic 16 Line Quran script in book style reading experience, with an easy to use interface
- Full screen mode for immersive reading experience 
- Read in color with tajweed rules or read in black and white
- Auto-rotate for portrait or landscape mode - no pixelation 
 

NAVIGATION AND USAGE

- Bookmark pages or bookmark a specific sentence
- Jump to any page by using the "Slide to Page" feature
- Main index allow easy navigation to Juz / Surah / Ayah / Page 
- Intuitive “tap & hold” menu
- Absolutely no Ads!

AUDIOS

- Verse by verse audio recitations 
- Memorize sections - Hifz friendly mode to repeat lines or section multiple times
- App includes audio of Abdullah Basfar
- In App purchase to gain access to more audio which includes 20+ reciters listed below:

Abdul Basit
Abdul Rahman al-Hudhaify

TRANSLATIONS

VERIFICATION

This application has been verified by our team thoroughly. Some of the verification team members include:

Maulana Mohmed Sulaiman Patel from Masjid e Umar in Auckland New Zealand. MasjideUmar is the busiest masjid in New Zealand - see www.masjideumar.co.nz

Mufti Mohammed Ghiyas Mohiuddin from Madrasa Arabia Hifzul Quraan in India - see www.hifzulquraan.com


ANY FURTHER ERRORS

این اپلیکیشن، یک منبع جامع و کامل از کتاب‌های درسی مکتب برای دانش آموزان صنف اول تا دوازده است. با داشتن این اپلیکیشن، دیگر نیازی به حمل کتاب‌های فیزیکی نیست. تمام کتاب‌های مورد نیاز شما در یک مکان قابل دسترس، به صورت فایل‌های PDF باکیفیت بالا موجود هستند. این اپلیکیشن به شما امکان می‌دهد تا به سرعت و به آسانی به مطالب درسی دسترسی پیدا کنید، مطالعه کنید و حتی نکات مهم را علامت‌گذاری نمایید. همچنین، امکان جستجوی پیشرفته در میان متن‌ها، افزودن یادداشت‌ها و بوک‌مارک‌ها به شما کمک می‌کند تا تجربه مطالعه‌ای سازمان‌یافته و موثری داشته باشید
